In a message dated 3/2/03 8:19:24 PM Central Standard Time, 
cardhead649@... writes:


> Empath understands all too well.  She realizes quickly something is 
> shielding Maxima from her powers, and taps into the power of the Soul 
> Orbs to force her way past the block.  She doesn't like what she 
> sees, but walks with Maxima anyway, confident in her own ability to 
> defend herself.  "You've been talking with Hydras, haven't you?"
> 

Glancing sideways at the former Decepticon. "Thought we were not supposed to 
read minds?" It stunned her for a moment, then she pushed it aside as though 
it didn't matter. 

"Maybe I have... maybe I haven't. I went to the base to see this... Hydras.. 
for myself. Wheeljack informed me of what happened. Megatron & Galvatron 
merging & forming Hydras." cocking a brow. "An interesting trick." 

Once again, glancing at Empath. "What is your opinion on this Leader?" then 
looking forward. "By what I understand.. he says you betrayed him. Is that 
correct?" She wanted to get to the bottom of the matter before she made a 
decision or move. 

She was an independent Decepticon now. Still clinging to the old ways. & in 
most cases, her original programming was more evident than the rest of her 
knowledge. The personality of when she was a Political Aide was surfacing 
above anything else. 
For a moment, she wondered if this is why Alpha Trion resurrected her... to 
bring peace to them all? Fat chance! She was a Decepticon! She was to conquer 
& rule... or destroy. She ws NOT going to be an Agent of Peace for Alpha 
Trion. 

She waited for Empath's answer & reply.

--part1_1e5.36d0b8a.2b944de7_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable
